title: Wiwo
author: Wiwo
content: This is just to alert us on the current happening with Remitano exchange one of the popular Bitcoin p2p exchanges were we de use mostly for 9ja sent an email to their clients today around 4 pm informing them of the maintenance on their Bitcoin wallet as a result of recent network congestion. So during this mentainance Bitcoin deposit and withdrawal is on hold,  so anyone looking to exchange Bitcoin through p2p should avoid remittano for now until the maintenance is completed.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Already existing thread which was created an hours and some minutes ago:Network Congestion Issue in RamitanoBest to lock this thread.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on August 24, 2023, 09:41:39 PMAlready existing thread which was created an hours and some minutes ago:Network Congestion Issue in RamitanoBest to lock this thread.Hey mate thanks,  sometime the forum search engine sucks,  I tried searching to see if the this topic have been raised before and it shows nothing in the result why a created this to alert others. But since someone else has already done that,  I will go ahead to lick the thread now, Thanks for alerting me.
